content:
@Laryn and @Herb seems like I have a crazy week. :at_work: I'm hoping to take a closer look at our options following weekend.

(meh, that's the wrong stream...)

@Laryn I think, my hint was misleading, as you'd need a boolean in i18nviews_localization_plugin_enabled... config_get('views.settings', 'views_localization_plugin') returns a string - usually "core" or "none".
I'm curious if i18nviews still works, if you rip out all the views_localization_plugin stuff... I'm not sure if it's needed, as it's usually not set to i18n_string. Core does the same.
I'll try stripping that stuff out completely next week and test it out.
